name: hizee
description:
Hizee is an entertaining game of strategy designed for simple and fast play. It is easy to learn, but difficult to master.

Hizee is like Yahtzee with a twist. Each die has pips (dots) of three colors, and some categories require the pips to all be the same color. New categories include 2-Pair Same Color, Full House Same Color, and Flush.

Use Game Center to track accomplishments and compare your best scores to others around the world. Set usernames to keep track of your own high scores and average score on your device.

Try playing with loaded dice to improve your high scores.
